survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: perfecto! estoy al inicio junto a un camino que lleva a una isla pequeña con un tigre
where do I go from here?
to the island with the parrot
alright, so i moved southwest to the big island with the parrot on a tree
go to the island with the frog
genial! navegué al sudeste hasta la isla con el sapo
okay, went left past the crocodile
Vuelvo a ver la isla grande con el elefante. ¿Cuál es el siguiente paso?
pass the island with the giraffe
listo! fui hacia el oeste y encontré la isla con la jirafa
pass the snake on the branch
hecho, pasé al sudeste de la jirafa y encontré la serpiente en la rama
keep going til you reach the treasure
¡impresionante! di dos pasos al este y encontré el tesoro

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
awesome! first, walk a bit to the left, past that wooden bench you see, and cross the trail toward the florist stand
pero no llegues hasta el final; cuando estés a mitad de camino, haz un giro brusco en U hacia la izquierda y trota hacia el perro blanco. ¿entiendo?
nice, now cross back over the trail going south. there's going to be another white dog hanging out by a fancy red and white picnic blanket
keep on moving directly south. you get that?
right, now step over the picnic mat, make sure to touch the bowl of berries on the way
dirígete al oeste después de eso
great, you'll see another wooden branch, cross that one, it'll take you north across the river
nice. now you'll want to keep that big green bush on your left
awesome, just keep circling that bush, you're headed for our nice florist stand
from there, time to go west, you'll see a big bridge and two cyclists, go past it all
cool, as you move, you'll see two elderly folks on a bench, reading papers
they're right after the bridge. say hi for me!
Ve hacia el sur unos pasos, disparando a esa brecha entre los ancianos y una rama de madera.
see that green bush right at the end of the branch? head on down to meet it!
well done! now, let's go east
mantén la rama al norte y el arbusto al sur. fácil, ¿verdad?
keep a look out for a brown deer
it's really close now. can you see it?
that's it, buddy! you've hit the bull's eye

chat.msg: go south to the dog and turn toward the fire
alright! i'm by the fire now
go over the fire and under the mushroom and curve down the trail toward the car
see the bush on the left of the car?
pass down the trail on the left of the bush toward the telescope
go through the telescope and the bush next to it
now i see some rocks and a wooden house. you sure this is the right path?
okie dokie, heading towards the house now
go over the rocks and to the house
cool, made it over the rocks and i'm at the house
*terminado* ¡este juego es divertido! ¿Cuál es nuestro próximo paso, amigo?

chat.msg: awesome! see those three palm trees? good, we start there
start by heading southwest under the first one
¡gran trabajo! Ahora gira a la derecha y cruza la segunda palmera.
great! now make a sharp left turn before that third palm and start heading south
¿Ves el cachorro marrón? quédese en su lado izquierdo, luego gire un poco hacia la izquierda y rápidamente regrese a la derecha para ir nuevamente hacia el sur.
perfecto! now there's a big rock and a small rock, you gotta pass right between them and reach the ocean
sweet! now you're going to wade in
No te preocupes, no es demasiado profundo. ¿Ves ese gran cangrejo rojo? dirígete hacia el oeste hacia allí
nice! just follow that big rock on your right awhile, still heading west into the water
alright. now, keep going till you see a medium rock, then you gotta face a shark
allí gire bruscamente a la derecha. No te preocupes, es amigable. ¡Muchas gracias!
nailed it! now, we're stepping back on land
move on between this medium rock, and that colorful blue-yellow-white ball, heading north again
amigo, ¡estás en llamas! A continuación, gira ligeramente a la izquierda y continúa hacia el noroeste, ¿vale?
rock and roll! just make your way between that red tent on the left and the massive speaker on the right
Tendrás que dar vueltas alrededor de la tienda en el sentido contrario a las agujas del reloj. ¡Adelante, diviértete!
once you're done with the fun, head south but make sure stop just before reaching the sea
then go west along the shore under a red kayak. you're doing great!
perfect! now swing to your right (north) along the kayak
awesome! now, ease on up till you get to a small green bush
that's the final step, you made it! well done!
gran trabajo compañero! ahora tómate un momento para disfrutar, ¡te lo has ganado!
glad you had fun! we should totally do this again sometime

general_survey.answer: Yes in a home environment because my family speaks spanish
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think it's fine as long as they're comfortable
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:
